description: The CockroachLabs::ServerlessCluster::CockroachDB resource creates a serverless cluster to run an instance of CockroachDB.

CockroachLabsCloudCredentials.description: Credentials for the CockroachLabs Cloud API

Region.description: Make sure to choose a region compatible with the cloud provider to deploy the cluster. For AWS, enter one of us-east-1, us-west-2, eu-central-1, eu-west-1, ap-southeast-1, ap-south-1. For GCP, enter one of us-east1, us-west2, us-central1, europe-west1, asia-southeast1, southamerica-east1.

Database.description: Enter at least one database name to be created in the serverless cluster.

Name.description: Database name must start with a letter, number, or underscore; must contain only letters, numbers, dashes, periods or underscores; and must be between 1 and 63 characters.
Name must be 6-20 characters in length and can include numbers, lowercase letters, and dashes (but no leading or trailing dashes).

Provider.description: Cloud provider to run the cluster (Amazon Web Services or Google Cloud Platform).

Regions.description: Region to run the CockroachDB cluster on Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Google Cloud Platform (GCP).

SpendLimit.description: Spend limit in US cents. A credit card must be registered in the CockroachLabs account for any limit above zero.

Databases.description: Enter at least one database name to be created in the serverless cluster.

Certificate.description: Save the CA certificate provided by the cluster to the default PostgreSQL certificate directory on your machine. (Possibly $HOME/.postgresql/ on Unix-based systems; $env:appdata\postgresql\ on Windows)
